ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A set of handy functions. Includes a versatile one line progress bar, one  line function timer with detailed output, time delay function, text histogram, object  preview, CRAN package search, simpler package installer, Linux command install check,  a flexible Mode function, top function, simulation of correlated data, and more.

A set of handy functions. Includes a versatile one line progress bar, one  line function timer with detailed output, time delay function, text histogram, object  preview, CRAN package search, simpler package installer, Linux command install check,  a flexible Mode function, top function, simulation of correlated data, and more.

name: r-ncmisc
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.3.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ncmisc
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/NCmisc_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/NCmisc/NCmisc_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 125faea8800c1eb715b31ebd9f78f7ebcfff9062252ef4c2a1374672776695c0

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-proftools
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-proftools

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('NCmisc')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('NCmisc')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=NCmisc
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: A set of handy functions. Includes a versatile one line progress bar, one  line function timer with detailed output, time delay function, text histogram, object  preview, CRAN package search, simpler package installer, Linux command install check,  a flexible Mode function, top function, simulation of 
    correlated data, and more.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: NCmisc
# Type: Package
# Version: 1.1.6
# Date: 2018-11-11
# Title: Miscellaneous Functions for Creating Adaptive Functions and Scripts
# Author: Nicholas Cooper
# Maintainer: Nicholas Cooper <njcooper@gmx.co.uk>
# Depends: R (>= 3.3), grDevices, graphics, stats, utils
# Imports: tools, proftools, methods
# Suggests: KernSmooth, Matrix
# Description: A set of handy functions. Includes a versatile one line progress bar, one  line function timer with detailed output, time delay function, text histogram, object  preview, CRAN package search, simpler package installer, Linux command install check,  a flexible Mode function, top function, simulation of correlated data, and more.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-11-11 23:32:51 UTC; ncooper
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-11-12 00:00:03 UTC
